file.name: issue455.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Test Server
  version: "1.0"
servers:
  - url: 'http://localhost:8000'
paths:
  /v1/Boo:
    post:
      summary: Test resource
      operationId: boo
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/RecursiveData"
      responses:
        200:
          description: Ok
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/RecursiveData"

components:
  schemas:
    RecursiveData:
      type: object
      description: Represents a recursive nested object
      required: [id, display_name]
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        display_name:
          type: string
        nesting:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/RecursiveData"
